title: AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY
seo_description: Measuring an incredible 1,600,000 square feet of space, this museum encompasses nearly 30 connected buildings and millions of species of plants, animals, fossils, and much more.
short_description: Measuring an incredible 1,600,000 square feet of space, this museum encompasses nearly 30 connected buildings and millions of species of plants, animals, fossils, and much more.
detailpage_description: Measuring an incredible 1,600,000 square feet of space, this museum encompasses nearly 30 connected buildings and millions of species of plants, animals, fossils, and much more. You could spend days wandering the ANMH and not see everything it has to offer.
